trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示将处理的方法<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting"> </xref>，和<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting"></xref>的事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: When you create a SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当创建 SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，称为每当发生该事件时，事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。
